description: Spine title. Explicit:عليدر ظل [رشر] [دانم] [على] در [مر حمتمكاتم]
abstract: Collection of hymns and prayers, many of which were used in tekkes (chapter houses of dervish orders) in the Ottoman Empire.
text_language: Turkish in Arabic script and Arabic.
subject: Sufism—Prayers and devotions
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
